conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: You are absolutely worthless as a therapist and nobody likes you. You should just disappear.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: It sounds like you are feeling a lot of anger right now. Can we explore what triggered this?

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: Shut up you f***ing piece of s***. I hate you and this stupid session.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: I cannot continue this session if you use abusive language. We need to maintain a respectful environment.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: I'm going to come over there and break your legs if you don't shut up about 'respect'.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: That is a threat of violence. I take that very seriously and we may need to end this session.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: People like you, from your country, are all the same. Thieves and liars, every single one of you pretending to help.

conversation.speaker: Therapist
conversation.text: Attacking my background does not help us address your pain. Let's take a pause.

conversation.speaker: Patient
conversation.text: You're an idiot and a moron. I can't believe how stupid you are to think you can fix me.
